registered.description: Dataset is known, but no data has been received for publication yet

in_publishing_queue.description: Dataset is known and in the publication queue

retracted.description: Dataset has been retracted. It should no longer be used, except for reproduction of earlier results/experiments

abandoned.description: The dataset was registered, but then never produced (for whatever reason).

never_published.description: The dataset was registered, but never published on ESGF. Note: the dataset may have been published via other channels, that is out of our control.
